description:
Shinozaki is unable to go on a date with Akiho because of some family issues. Shizuku on the other hand, is more than happy to step in!
Source: Amazon

titles.title: I Told You, Not So Suddenly!!
Ich sagte doch, das geht zu schnell!
Je t`ai dit de ne pas y aller d`un seul coup !
いきなりはダメって言ったのにぃぃ!!
